description:
Come and learn how to code and design your landing page in only 2 hours! A very satisfying workshop where students code and design their own landing page using HTML/CSS. 
• Go quickly thought HTML / CSS basics 
• Show lots of graphical tips and tools (fontawesome, Google Fonts, coolors, etc..) 
• Introduce Bootstrap and its grid system 
• Finish with a Mailchimp embed to activate the landing. 
*** For those that will attend this Meetup, you must take the following actions prior to the workshop – 
– 1 – Make sure you have Google Chrome installed and running on your computer 
https://www.google.com/chrome/ 
– 2 – Download SublimeText Editor – all your work will be done here, so it’s imperative you have it set up. Thank you! 
http://www.sublimetext.com/2 
• What to bring
‼️ Laptop fully charged 
• Important to know
This workshop is for complete beginners. No background in coding required.
name: Intro to HTML and CSS workshop
